name: VisitationRate
description: Recreation and tourism are important components of many national and local economies and they contribute in innumerable ways to physical wellbeing, learning, and quality of life. To quantify the value of natural environments, the InVEST recreation model predicts the spread of person-days of recreation, based on the locations of natural habitats and other features that factor into peopleâ€™s decisions about where to recreate. In the absence of empirical data on visitation, we parameterize the model using a proxy for visitation: geotagged photographs posted to the website flickr. Using photographs, the model predicts how future changes to natural features will alter visitation rates and outputs maps showing current and future patterns of recreational use.

inputParams.name: Area_of_Interest
inputParams.description: An OGR-supported vector file representing the area of interest where the model will run the analysis.
inputParams.label: Area of Interest Shapefile

inputParams.name: Start_Year
inputParams.description: Year to start PUD calculations, date starts on Jan 1st. Inclusive, must be >= 2005.
inputParams.label: Start Year (>= 2005)

inputParams.name: End_Year
inputParams.description: Year to end PUD calculations, date ends and includes Dec 31st. Inclusive, must be <= 2014.
inputParams.label: End Year (<=2014)

inputParams.name: Grid_the_AOI
inputParams.description: When checked (default), overlay grid cells of a given shape type on top of the area of interest. Grid cells will be used to aggregate predictors and counts over the study area.
inputParams.label: Grid the AOI

inputParams.name: Grid_Type
inputParams.description: Select the shape of the grid used by the model.
inputParams.label: Grid Type

inputParams.name: Cell_Size
inputParams.description: The size of the grid units measured in the projection units of the AOI. For example, UTM projections use meters.
inputParams.label: Cell Size
